PydyGp User Guide¶

This guide is intdended as an introductory overview of PydyGp and explains how to install and make use of the most important features. For detailed reference documentation of the functions and classes contained in the package, see the PydyGp Reference.

  • 1. Kernels
    • 1.1. The generic Kernel object
    • 1.2. The Square Exponential Kernel
  • 2. Gaussian Processes
    • 2.1. Simple Gaussian Process Regression
    • 2.2. Hyperparameter Optimisation
  • 3. Multiplicative Latent Force Models
    • 3.1. Simulating the MLFM
  • 4. Using Sphinx Gallery
    • 4.1. Examples using pydygp.gaussianprocesses.GaussianProcess
    • 4.2. Examples using pydygp.linlatentforcemodels.MLFM
